item.description:
We have decided to have "one more last" wrap up session on Kant and read his: Religion within the Limits of Reason Alone (http://www.hkbu.edu.h... )

Please note that we also adjusted our near future plan by adding Schopenhauer before moving onto Hegel later this year. Currently our NearFuturePlan file is:
1. Kant:
One wrap up session has left

2. Rousseau: Social Contract
3. Thomas Paine: Rights of Man and Edmund Burke: On the Revolution in France (Number of meetings: 1 or 2)
4. Federalist Papers (??Anti-Federalist Papers??) (Number of meetings: ??)
5. Adam Smith: The Theory of Moral Sentiments (Number of meetings: ??)
6. d'Holbach: The System of Nature
7. Schopenhauer: The World as Will and Representation (Number of meetings: ??)
.
.
Hegel at one point in 2009
Phenomenology (of Spirit)
Maybe also:
Philosophy of Right
Philosophy of History
item.how_to_find_us: Please ask for the philosophy meetup group from the staff
item.name: Wrap up session on Kant.... II
